director.name: 维克多·博吉诺夫 Victor Bojinov

introduction: А concert with the music of Petar Dundakov. United by the metaphor of the wind, the different parts of the music represent different states and pictures, taking the public to unique audio-visual trip. The concert-film is masterfully shot by Victor Bojinov and it’s a  musical crossover made by wonderful  musicians,  coming from  different musical worlds – jazz, folklore and classical music. The intertwining of music of Dundakov with the video images of the video artist Ivan Bogdanov turning the Song of the Winds into audio-visual poetry.
